originalText.text: Deciding to go grey after decades of coloring my hair I was anxious, putting it mildly, so I asked my son-in-law, a top fashion photographer,  who to go to.  He suggested Sharon Dorram and I couldn’t have been more pleased.  The blend to transition the color from golden brown to grey  is perfect.  Given Covid I was worried about protocols and the salon is well run, not over crowded and services timely. The  staff and Sharon are friendly with no attitude.  I don’t usually write reviews but hair is important and this is an excellent resource.

originalText.text:
I have been going to Meaghan Phelps (color) and Brandi Voorhees (cut) for years. They are the only ones I will trust with my hair. They always make feel so confident when I'm in their chair and it's clear they take their craft very serious.
I have been to this salon many times and it's always a wonderful experience. Even during COVID I felt so safe and it was obvious they are taking every precaution to keep the salon clean and safe without compromising a great environment.

originalText.text: A week ago went to Sally’s for a big hair transformation. My stylist Brandi performed such a brilliant work – I’m in love with my new haircut! Go see Brandi she’s a super star!! And everyone in this salon is very polite and hospitable pure joy and luxury experience.

text.text: A week ago went to Sally’s for a big hair transformation. My stylist Brandi performed such a brilliant work – I’m in love with my new haircut! Go see Brandi she’s a super star!! And everyone in this salon is very polite and hospitable pure joy and luxury experience.

originalText.text: Brandi is the only one I’ll trust to cut my hair! When Brandi first cut my hair, it was right before Covid, since living in Vermont I couldn’t make it down to the city for a year and a half because of the pandemic. When things were finally starting to open up I knew I needed Brandi to give me a fresh cut and that’s exactly what she did. I will definitely be back!

text.text: Brandi is the only one I’ll trust to cut my hair! When Brandi first cut my hair, it was right before Covid, since living in Vermont I couldn’t make it down to the city for a year and a half because of the pandemic. When things were finally starting to open up I knew I needed Brandi to give me a fresh cut and that’s exactly what she did. I will definitely be back!

originalText.text: I have been going to Brandi and Meaghan for the past 7 years. Brandi's scissor-hands are magic - my hair always looks bomb, even when I'm lazy and don't style it (which, let's face it, is most of the time). Meaghan's color gives my hair the dimension and depth I didn't know I needed and now I can't live without. If there's a version of this planet in which this power duo does not exist, I don't want any part of it. Period.
